urls.title: Coronavirus/COVID-19 Special Coverage
urls.description: Brian's singular big-picture look at how the coronavrius pandemic fits into American history, politics, and society, launched for RCN the day America hit 100,000 recorded COVID-19 deaths, and his proposal for a Cabinet-level pandemic department. Click HERE to downlo

text: @tribelaw @AshaRangappa_ As the White House attacks Dr. Fauci, in order to truly appreciate how truly abysmally awful our national coronavirus response under Trump has been, you need to look at the bigger picture. My deep-dive coverage here: https://t.co/zEJyEo69Pv
